text: The Red Cross has has come under fire after admitting administration costs alone could take away 10% of bushfire donations. https://t.co/4LLsVGFJu6

I criticised the Red Cross for their plan to withhold some bushfire donations for future disasters. Wisely, they have rescinded that. But, they are being unfairly attacked over 10% for administration costs. When I ran the Variety Club that was our rule. It is for most charities.

The worst kind of irresponsible reporting. When $10m goes to critical infrastructure and processing of donations you don’t headline that as “$10 million will not go to the cause.“ “Red Cross director admits $10MILLION will not go to bushfire victims” https://t.co/B7hOyDNLF8
